alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk Valley; Middle Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 6:17AM AKST until January 16 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected with freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting to 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk Valley-Middle Yukon Valley. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow north and west of Galena. Freezing rain most likely south of Galena.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk Valley; Middle Yukon Valley
